article.headline: Marist 59, Iona 57
article.story: POUGHKEEPSIE, N.Y. (AP) -- Carl Hood scored 17 points to lead Marist to a 59-57 victory over Iona on Sunday. Hood, who had three 3-pointers also grabbed nine rebounds for the Red Foxes (6-17, 4-10 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference). Greg Jenkins had 26 points and seven rebounds for Iona (7-16, 5-9), while Kiril Waschmann had seven rebounds. Iona pulled within 56-55 with 1:03 to play, but Marist's Brandon Ellerbee connected on his first field goal of the game with 34 seconds left and Eric Siegrist had his only point, a free throw with 15 seconds remaining, to seal the win. Steve Burtt's last-second jumper rimmed out and Hood pulled in the rebound as the buzzer sounded.
